channel.title: [317] having trouble adding specials [317]
channel.description:
Ok, so i dont have a special.java. and tut's for adding d claws spec say i need it. and i'm not sure how i'd add a spec in the server's client.java
i could use another spec as a template. but they all have different structures. so it's confusing me.
any suggestions?

item.title: [317] having trouble adding specials [317]
item.dc:creator: @Trent1 Trent!!
item.description:
@Trent1 wrote:

like i said.
i could add a special using another weapons special as a template.
but all the specials have different structures, so it’s confusing.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] having trouble adding specials [317]
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Specials.java is only used to define which weapons have the special bar attached to them, not the special attacks themselves.
I dont see how missing Specials.java is effecting you adding specials.

Read full topic
